verses.verse: I love <S%H7355><s%> you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, my strength. <S%H2391><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is my rock, <S%H5553><s%> my fortress, <S%H4686><s%> and my deliverer; <S%H6403><s%> my God, <S%H410><s%> my rock, <S%H6697><s%> in whom I take refuge; <S%H2620><s%> my shield, <S%H4043><s%> and the horn <S%H7161><s%> of my salvation, <S%H3468><s%> my high tower. <S%H4869><s%>
I call <S%H7121><s%> on Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who is worthy to be praised; <S%H1984><s%> and I am saved <S%H3467><s%> from my enemies. <S%H341><s%>
The cords <S%H2256><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> surrounded <S%H661><s%> me. <S%H5158><s%> The floods of ungodliness <S%H1100><s%> made me afraid. <S%H1204><s%>
The cords <S%H2256><s%> of Sheol <S%H7585><s%> were around <S%H5437><s%> me. <S%H4170><s%> The snares of death <S%H4194><s%> came on me. <S%H6923><s%>

In my distress <S%H6862><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> on Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and cried <S%H7768><s%> to my God. <S%H430><s%> He heard <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> out of his temple. <S%H1964><s%> My cry <S%H7775><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him came <S%H935><s%> into his ears. <S%H241><s%>

Then the earth <S%H776><s%> shook <S%H1607><s%> and trembled. <S%H7493><s%> The foundations <S%H4146><s%> also of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> quaked <S%H7264><s%> and were shaken, <S%H1607><s%> because he was angry. <S%H2734><s%>

Smoke <S%H6227><s%> went out <S%H5927><s%> of his nostrils. <S%H639><s%> Consuming <S%H398><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> came out of his mouth. <S%H6310><s%> Coals <S%H1513><s%> were kindled by it. <S%H1197><s%>
He bowed <S%H5186><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> also, <S%H3381><s%> and came down. Thick darkness <S%H6205><s%> was under his feet. <S%H7272><s%>
He rode <S%H7392><s%> on a cherub, <S%H3742><s%> and flew. <S%H5774><s%> Yes, <S%H5774><s%> he soared on the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the wind. <S%H7307><s%>

He made <S%H7896><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> his hiding place, <S%H5643><s%> his pavilion <S%H5521><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> him, <S%H2824><s%> darkness of waters, <S%H4325><s%> thick clouds <S%H5645><s%> of the skies. <S%H5645><s%>
At the brightness <S%H5051><s%> before him his thick clouds <S%H5645><s%> passed, <S%H5674><s%> hailstones <S%H1259><s%> and coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> also thundered <S%H7481><s%> in the sky. <S%H8064><s%> The Most High <S%H5945><s%> uttered <S%H5414><s%> his voice: <S%H6963><s%> hailstones <S%H1259><s%> and coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>
He sent out <S%H7971><s%> his arrows, <S%H2671><s%> and scattered <S%H6327><s%> them; <S%H1300><s%> Yes, great lightning bolts, <S%H7232><s%> and routed them. <S%H2000><s%>

Then the channels <S%H650><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> appeared. <S%H7200><s%> The foundations <S%H4146><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> were laid bare <S%H1540><s%> at your rebuke, <S%H1606><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> at the blast <S%H5397><s%> of the breath <S%H7307><s%> of your nostrils. <S%H639><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> from on high. <S%H4791><s%> He took <S%H3947><s%> me. <S%H4871><s%> He drew me out of many <S%H7227><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>
He delivered <S%H5337><s%> me from my strong <S%H5794><s%> enemy, <S%H341><s%> from those who hated <S%H8130><s%> me; <S%H553><s%> for they were too mighty for me.
They came on <S%H6923><s%> me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my calamity, <S%H343><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was my support. <S%H4937><s%>
He brought me forth <S%H3318><s%> also into a large place. <S%H4800><s%> He delivered <S%H2502><s%> me, <S%H2654><s%> because he delighted in me.
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has rewarded <S%H1580><s%> me according to my righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> According to the cleanness <S%H1252><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%> has he recompensed me. <S%H7725><s%>
For I have kept <S%H8104><s%> the ways <S%H1870><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and have not wickedly departed <S%H7561><s%> from my God. <S%H430><s%>
For all his ordinances <S%H4941><s%> were before me. <S%H5493><s%> I didn't put away his statutes from me. <S%H2708><s%>
I was also blameless <S%H8549><s%> with him. <S%H8104><s%> I kept myself from my iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

Therefore Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has rewarded <S%H7725><s%> me according to my righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> according to the cleanness <S%H1252><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%> in his eyesight. <S%H5869><s%>
With the merciful <S%H2623><s%> you will show yourself merciful. <S%H2616><s%> With the perfect <S%H8549><s%> man, <S%H1399><s%> you will show yourself perfect. <S%H8552><s%>
With the pure, <S%H1305><s%> you will show yourself pure. <S%H1305><s%> With the crooked <S%H6141><s%> you will show yourself shrewd. <S%H6141><s%>
For you will save <S%H3467><s%> the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> but the haughty <S%H7311><s%> eyes <S%H5869><s%> you will bring down. <S%H8213><s%>
For you will light <S%H215><s%> my lamp, <S%H5216><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> My God <S%H430><s%> will light <S%H5050><s%> up my darkness. <S%H2822><s%>
For by you, <S%H7323><s%> I advance through a troop. <S%H1416><s%> By my God, <S%H430><s%> I leap over <S%H1801><s%> a wall. <S%H7791><s%>

As for God, <S%H410><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> is perfect. <S%H8549><s%> The word <S%H565><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is tried. <S%H6884><s%> He is a shield <S%H4043><s%> to all those who take refuge in him. <S%H2620><s%>
For who is God, <S%H433><s%> except <S%H1107><s%> Yahweh? <S%H3068><s%> Who is a rock, <S%H6697><s%> besides <S%H2108><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%>
the God <S%H410><s%> who arms <S%H247><s%> me with strength, <S%H2428><s%> and makes <S%H5414><s%> my way <S%H1870><s%> perfect? <S%H8549><s%>
He makes <S%H7737><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> like deer <S%H355><s%>'s feet, <S%H5975><s%> and sets me on my high places. <S%H1116><s%>
He teaches <S%H3925><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> to war, <S%H4421><s%> so that my arms <S%H2220><s%> bend <S%H5181><s%> a bow <S%H7198><s%> of bronze. <S%H5154><s%>

You have also given <S%H5414><s%> me the shield <S%H4043><s%> of your salvation. <S%H3468><s%> Your right hand <S%H3225><s%> sustains <S%H5582><s%> me. <S%H6037><s%> Your gentleness has made me great. <S%H7235><s%>
You have enlarged <S%H7337><s%> my steps <S%H6806><s%> under me, <S%H7166><s%> My feet have not slipped. <S%H4571><s%>
I will pursue <S%H7291><s%> my enemies, <S%H341><s%> and overtake <S%H5381><s%> them. <S%H7725><s%> Neither will I turn again until they are consumed. <S%H3615><s%>
I will strike <S%H4272><s%> them through, <S%H3201><s%> so that they will not be able to rise. <S%H6965><s%> They shall fall <S%H5307><s%> under my feet. <S%H7272><s%>
For you have armed <S%H247><s%> me with strength <S%H2428><s%> to the battle. <S%H4421><s%> You have subdued <S%H3766><s%> under me those who rose up against me. <S%H6965><s%>
You have also made <S%H5414><s%> my enemies <S%H341><s%> turn their backs <S%H6203><s%> to me, <S%H6789><s%> that I might cut off those who hate me. <S%H8130><s%>
They cried, <S%H7768><s%> but there was none to save; <S%H3467><s%> even to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> but he didn't <S%H6030><s%> answer them.
Then I beat <S%H7833><s%> them small as the dust <S%H6083><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the wind. <S%H7307><s%> I cast them out <S%H7324><s%> as the mire <S%H2916><s%> of the streets. <S%H2351><s%>

You have delivered <S%H6403><s%> me from the strivings <S%H7379><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%> You have made <S%H7760><s%> me the head <S%H7218><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%> A people <S%H5971><s%> whom I have not known <S%H3045><s%> shall serve me. <S%H5647><s%>
As soon as they hear <S%H8088><s%> of me they shall obey <S%H8085><s%> me. <S%H1121><s%> The foreigners shall submit themselves to me. <S%H3584><s%>
The foreigners <S%H1121><s%> shall fade away, <S%H5034><s%> and shall come trembling <S%H2727><s%> out of their close places. <S%H4526><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> lives; <S%H2416><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> be my rock. <S%H6697><s%> Exalted <S%H7311><s%> be the God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation, <S%H3468><s%>
even the God <S%H410><s%> who executes vengeance <S%H5414><s%> for me, <S%H1696><s%> and subdues peoples under me. <S%H5971><s%>

He rescues <S%H6403><s%> me from my enemies. <S%H341><s%> Yes, <S%H7311><s%> you lift me up above those who rise up <S%H7311><s%> against me. <S%H5337><s%> You deliver me from the violent <S%H2555><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>
Therefore I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and will sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to your name. <S%H8034><s%>

He gives great <S%H1431><s%> deliverance <S%H3444><s%> to his king, <S%H4428><s%> and shows <S%H6213><s%> loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> to his anointed, <S%H4899><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> and to his seed, <S%H2233><s%> <S%H5704><s%> forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>
